name: KoBoToolbox
semantic_context: Work with KoBoToolbox forms and submissions
natural_language_description: 这是 KoBoToolbox 节点。主要用于: Work with KoBoToolbox forms and submissions

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: submission | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get a file content
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many files

formId.name: formId
formId.description: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False | (必填项)

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: download (值: None) - Whether to download submitted attachments

dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName (值: None) - Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"
fields (值: None) - Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve (e.g. _submission_time,_submitted_by). If left blank, all fields are retrieved.
version (值: None) - Attachment size to retrieve, if multiple versions are available
selectMask (值: None) - Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as multiselect fields, i.e. parsed as arrays.
numberMask (值: None) - Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as numbers
reformat (值: None) - Whether to apply some reformatting to the submission data, such as parsing GeoJSON coordinates
sort (值: None) - Sort predicates, in MongoDB JSON format (e.g. {"_submission_time":1})

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: filter (值: None) - A text search query based on form data - e.g. "owner__username:meg AND name__icontains:quixotic" - see docs for more details

hookId.name: hookId
hookId.description: Hook ID (starts with h, e.g. hVehywQ2oXPYGHJHKtqth4)
hookId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Hook ID | 作用: Hook ID (starts with h, e.g. hVehywQ2oXPYGHJHKtqth4) | (必填项)

logId.name: logId
logId.description: Hook log ID (starts with hl, e.g. hlSbGKaUKzTVNoWEVMYbLHe)
logId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Hook Log ID | 作用: Hook log ID (starts with hl, e.g. hlSbGKaUKzTVNoWEVMYbLHe) | (必填项)

status.name: status
status.description: Only retrieve logs with a specific status
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Log Status | 作用: Only retrieve logs with a specific status

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: Minimum date for the hook log to retrieve
startDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: Minimum date for the hook log to retrieve

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: Maximum date for the hook log to retrieve
endDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date | 作用: Maximum date for the hook log to retrieve

submissionId.name: submissionId
submissionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Submission ID | 作用: Submission ID (number, e.g. 245128) | (必填项)

validationStatus.name: validationStatus
validationStatus.natural_language_description: 参数名: Validation Status | 作用: Desired Validation Status | (必填项)

filterType.name: filterType
filterType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: none

jsonNotice.displayName: See Formhub API docs to creating filters, using the MongoDB JSON format - e.g. {"_submission_time":{"$lt":"2021-10-01T01:02:03"}}
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice
jsonNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: See Formhub API docs to creating filters, using the MongoDB JSON format - e.g. {"_submission_time":{"$lt":"2021-10-01T01:02:03"}}

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: Uid of the file (should start with "af" e.g. "afQoJxA4kmKEXVpkH6SYbhb"
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: Uid of the file (should start with "af" e.g. "afQoJxA4kmKEXVpkH6SYbhb" | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property containing the file to upload. Supported types: image, audio, video, csv, xml, zip.
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property containing the file to upload. Supported types: image, audio, video, csv, xml, zip. | 默认值: data | (必填项)

download.name: download
download.description: Whether to download the file content into a binary property
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download File Content | 作用: Whether to download the file content into a binary property | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileMode.name: fileMode
fileMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Upload Mode | 默认值: binary | (必填项)

fileUrl.name: fileUrl
fileUrl.description: HTTP(s) link to the file to upload
fileUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: File URL | 作用: HTTP(s) link to the file to upload | (必填项)
